snippet: Andy Murray saw off the mercurial challenge of Australian Nick Kyrgios with little fuss on Monday, before just as smoothly playing down growing expectations that a second Wimbledon title is his for the taking....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray saw off the mercurial challenge of Australian Nick Kyrgios with little fuss on Monday, before just as smoothly playing down growing expectations that a second Wimbledon title is his for the taking.

headline.print_headline: Slick Murray Downs Kyrgios as Title Expectations Grow
headline.main: Slick Murray Downs Kyrgios as Title Expectations Grow
